title: Type Soul Weapon Tier List
description: This is a tier list of the weapons in the game Type Soul. The list is based on my own opinion and experience, and your mileage may vary. I have also included some factors to consider when choosing a weapon, as well as some tips for choosing the right weapon for you.
heading: Type Soul Weapon Tier List
introText: This is a tier list of the weapons in the game Type Soul. The list is based on my own opinion and experience, and your mileage may vary. I have also included some factors to consider when choosing a weapon, as well as some tips for choosing the right weapon for you.

data.itemDescription: This weapon has a large hitbox and deals high damage, making it a great choice for both PvE and PvP. The axe's special ability allows you to stun enemies, which can be very useful in combat.
This katana is known for its long range and fast attacks. It also has a unique ability that allows you to teleport short distances, which can be used to dodge attacks or close the gap on enemies.
This weapon is a great all-around choice that is effective in both PvE and PvP. It has a good balance of damage, range, and speed, and its special ability allows you to heal yourself and your allies.

This scythe has a wide range and deals high damage, making it a great choice for crowd control. The scythe's special ability allows you to launch a powerful projectile that can damage multiple enemies.
This dagger is known for its high attack speed and critical hit chance. It also has a unique ability that allows you to dodge attacks while moving, which can be very useful in PvP.
This sword is a solid choice for both PvE and PvP. It has a good balance of damage, range, and speed, and its special ability allows you to increase your attack speed for a short period of time.

This gun is a great choice for players who want to stay at a distance from their enemies. It has a long range and deals high damage, and its special ability allows you to fire a homing projectile that can track down enemies.
This sword is known for its wide range and crowd control abilities. However, it has a slow attack speed and low damage output, which makes it less effective in PvP.

These claws are a good choice for players who want to get up close and personal with their enemies. They have a high attack speed and critical hit chance, but their short range can make them a liability in PvP.

This fan is a unique weapon that can be used for both offense and defense. It has a good range and can deal decent damage, but its slow attack speed and lack of crowd control abilities make it less effective in PvP.
This lance is known for its long range and high damage output. However, it has a very slow attack speed and is difficult to use effectively in PvP.
